metadata.job_title: Senior Data Engineer â€“ Commerce Data Pipelines

seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 3+ years experience, which aligns with senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' with core focus on ETL pipelines, data modeling, and data infrastructure

sub_specialty.evidence: Emphasis on ETL design/development, Airflow orchestration, and scheduled data pipelines rather than real-time streaming

leadership_expectation.evidence: Senior IC role focused on technical execution without mention of team leadership, mentoring, or direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider mentioned - only data warehouses (Snowflake/Redshift) which could be on any cloud

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in the job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL pipelines, scheduled data processing, and traditional data warehouse patterns rather than streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly mentioned as required skill and in responsibilities

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake and Redshift explicitly mentioned as required technologies

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid model requires 4 days onsite in specific locations (Seattle/Santa Monica/NYC), indicating regional proximity needed

timezone_focus.evidence: Locations mentioned are all US cities (Seattle, Santa Monica, NYC), indicating Americas focus

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid model requires 4 days onsite, suggesting candidates need to be local to one of the specified cities

h1b_friendly.evidence: Work authorization explicitly excludes H1B: 'All valid EADs except OPT, CPT, H1B'

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization excludes OPT and CPT specifically: 'All valid EADs except OPT, CPT, H1B'

citizenship_required.evidence: Accepts GC (Green Card) and USC (US Citizen), indicating these are the preferred/required statuses

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Rate specified as 'Up to $92.5/hr on W2' with explicit exclusion of C2C and 1099

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career growth, advancement opportunities, or development paths in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement, or career progression

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Long list of specific must-have requirements with clear technical specifications and 3+ years experience minimum

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific responsibilities and clear technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements (3+ years, SQL, ETL, Python, data warehouses) are appropriate for senior data engineer level
